categories: Category:Sergeants and lieutenants of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sergeant Torken was a Human male Imperial soldier of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Cold War with the Galactic Republic, he was stationed on Dromund Kaas. One of the primary lightning spires supplying Kaas City with power was raided and sabotaged by rebelling slaves and so he asked a traveler to deal with the rebellious slaves and recover the components.
